'''Steak''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Steak is available from the start of the game.

Depending on the quality, Steak revives and restores '''50'''/'''100'''/'''150''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Amber|Outrider's Champion Steak!}}
